metadata.Title: CVE-2017-2515 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium
metadata.Description:
An issue was discovered in certain Apple products. iOS before 10.3.2 isaffected. Safari before 10.1.1 is affected. tvOS before 10.2.1 is affected.The issue involves the "WebKit" component. It allows remote attackers toexecute arbitrary code or cause a denial of service (memory corruption andapplication crash) via a crafted web site.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-2515` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

gir1.2-javascriptcoregtk-4.0 - 2.16.2-1
gir1.2-webkit2-4.0 - 2.16.2-1
libjavascriptcoregtk-4.0-18 - 2.16.2-1
libjavascriptcoregtk-4.0-bin - 2.16.2-1
libwebkit2gtk-4.0-37 - 2.16.2-1
webkit2gtk-driver - 2.16.2-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: webkit2gtk package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.16.2-1').
qtwebkit-opensource-src package in esm-apps/jammy is affected and may need fixing.
